鷋字的基本解释

鷋
tú
古代传说中一种鸟喙蛇尾的怪鸟。
古同“鵌”，一种与鼠同穴而居的鸟。

鷋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tú］
［《集韻》同都切，平模，定。］
(1)见“鷋鳩”。
(2)同“鵌”。
(3)传说中怪鸟名。

鷋字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷋； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1498第12
【玉篇】大乎切【集韻】同都切，?音徒。【玉篇】鷋，鳩也。【爾雅·釋鳥】輿鵛鷋。【郭註】未詳。

鷋字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鷋字的起名意思

暂无。

Gluttonous
Basic explanation of words
Gluttonous
tú
A strange bird with a beak and a snake tail in ancient legends.
Ancient Tong "鵌", a kind of bird that lives in the same cave with the rat.
Gluttonous
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tú］
["Ji Yun" are cut in the same way, flat mold, fixed. ]
(1) See "Dove".
(2) Same as "鵌".
(3) The name of the strange bird in the legend.
Gluttonous
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷋; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1498 No. 12
[Jade articles] Big almost cut [Jiyun] The same all cut,? Sound disciple. [Jade articles] 鷋, also dove. [Erya·Shiniao] Yu Yuyu. [Guo Note] Unknown.
Gluttonous
